list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add changelogs and update Lalyan Cosmetic Core documentation
- Add changelog pages for Ancient Golemancy and Lalyan Cosmetic Core (EN/IT). - Add "Changelog" items to the sidebar in `astro.config.mjs`. - Update Lalyan Cosmetic Core documentation to reflect capitalized JSON keys (e.g., `Model`, `Texture`). - Add Permissions and Configuration sections to Lalyan Cosmetic Core documentation.

task.summary: Default task
Site completed
minor fix
minor fix
Comment out Mods Index sidebar item
minor changes
Add custom CSS for splash template and update mods headers

Add Lalyan Cosmetic Core resources and update sidebar configuration
- Create resources page for Lalyan Cosmetic Core in English and Italian - Reorganize sidebar to include a dedicated section for Lalyan Cosmetic Core - Rename license files from .md to .mdx

Add Lalyan Cosmetic Core preview image and cleanup mods index
- Add `preview.png` asset for Lalyan Cosmetic Core - Remove placeholder comments and fix indentation in English and Italian mods pages - Update IDE workspace configuration

Add Lalyan Cosmetic Core showcase and update documentation pages
- Create showcase pages in English and Italian - Update sidebar configuration to include showcase link - Rename documentation files to .mdx and add headers - Update titles and headers in resources pages - Move preview image to showcase directory

Add Ancient Golemancy and refactor Lalyan Cosmetic Core pages
- Add Ancient Golemancy mod section including Showcase, Lore, Guide, Documentation, and Resources pages. - Add Ancient Golemancy showcase images and update mods index. - Refactor Lalyan Cosmetic Core structure: - Move documentation content to `documentation.mdx`. - Convert main page to Showcase and remove old showcase file. - Update sidebar navigation links.

Update documentation headers and license footers
- Apply color styling to headers in Ancient Golemancy and Lalyan Cosmetic Core pages. - Add and correct license footers across English and Italian documentation. - Update Italian sidebar translations for Ancient Golemancy in `astro.config.mjs`.

Add Ancient Golemancy to Italian mods index
- Add Ancient Golemancy entry to `src/content/docs/it/mods.mdx`. - Fix indentation in `src/content/docs/en/mods.mdx`.

Refactor Lalyan Cosmetic Core (IT) pages and fix Ancient Golemancy link
- Move documentation content to `documentation.mdx` - Convert main page to showcase and delete `showcase.mdx` - Update header styling in `resources.mdx` - Fix Ancient Golemancy link in `it/mods.mdx`

Add Ancient Golemancy Italian translation and update site content
- Add Italian translation for Ancient Golemancy (Showcase, Guide, Lore, Documentation, Resources). - Add mod credits to Ancient Golemancy and Lalyan Cosmetic Core pages. - Add "Support the project" section to English and Italian index pages. - Update Ancient Golemancy showcase images and add a 6th image. - Refactor Lalyan Cosmetic Core Italian page and add Early Access warning. - Remove summary line from License pages and fix minor typos in English documentation.

Rename site to Lalyan Projects and update base URL
- Change base URL to `/Lalyan-Projects` and update site title in `astro.config.mjs`. - Update internal links and license footers across English and Italian documentation pages. - Update titles and taglines on the main landing pages.

Add Issues section to mod documentation pages
- Add "Issues" section to Ancient Golemancy and Lalyan Cosmetic Core pages. - Include contact information and bug reporting guidelines in English and Italian.

Add email subject guidelines to mod documentation
- Update Ancient Golemancy and Lalyan Cosmetic Core pages (EN/IT). - Specify `Mod-issues` as the required email subject for bug reports.

Replace Ko-fi LinkCard with interactive widget on index pages
- Create `KofiWidget_en` and `KofiWidget_it` components. - Replace static support LinkCard with the new widget in English and Italian index pages.

Add .idea to .gitignore
- Add `.idea/` to `.gitignore`.

Refactor KofiWidget components and update site configuration
- Rename `KofiWidget` components to `en.astro` and `it.astro` and update imports in index pages. - Add `/kofi` redirect in `astro.config.mjs`. - Fix typo in Italian index page title. - Remove unused Ancient Golemancy showcase icon.

Remove Ancient Golemancy showcase icon
- Delete `src/assets/mods/ancient-golemancy/showcase/icon.png`.

Remove Ancient Golemancy showcase icon
- Delete `src/assets/mods/ancient-golemancy/showcase/icon.png`.

Remove Ancient Golemancy showcase icon
- Delete `src/assets/mods/ancient-golemancy/showcase/icon.png`.

Remove Ancient Golemancy showcase icon
- Delete `src/assets/mods/ancient-golemancy/showcase/icon.png`.

Remove Ancient Golemancy showcase icon
- Delete `src/assets/mods/ancient-golemancy/showcase/icon.png`.

Remove Ancient Golemancy showcase icon
- Delete `src/assets/mods/ancient-golemancy/showcase/icon.png`.

Anchor .idea ignore pattern to root in .gitignore
- Update `.gitignore` to use `/.idea/` instead of `.idea/`.

Add Ancient Golemancy showcase icon
- Add `icon.png` to `src/assets/mods/ancient-golemancy/showcase/`.

Refactor Ko-fi widget and add videos to Ancient Golemancy
- Refactor Ko-fi widget structure into `Unlanguaged` base and `Languaged` wrappers. - Add `VideoPlayer` component with aspect ratio and size validation. - Add showcase videos and section headers to Ancient Golemancy pages (EN/IT). - Update English and Italian index pages to use the new Ko-fi button component.

Add Images header to Lalyan Cosmetic Core pages
- Add styled "Images" and "Immagini" headers to Lalyan Cosmetic Core pages (EN/IT).

Add changelogs and update Lalyan Cosmetic Core documentation
- Add changelog pages for Ancient Golemancy and Lalyan Cosmetic Core (EN/IT). - Add "Changelog" items to the sidebar in `astro.config.mjs`. - Update Lalyan Cosmetic Core documentation to reflect capitalized JSON keys (e.g., `Model`, `Texture`). - Add Permissions and Configuration sections to Lalyan Cosmetic Core documentation.

- Move documentation content to `documentation.mdx` - Convert main page to showcase and delete `showcase.mdx` - Update header styling in `resources.mdx` - Fix Ancient Golemancy link in `it/mods.mdx`

- Change base URL to `/Lalyan-Projects` and update site title in `astro.config.mjs`. - Update internal links and license footers across English and Italian documentation pages. - Update titles and taglines on the main landing pages.

Add Issues section to mod documentation pages
- Add "Issues" section to Ancient Golemancy and Lalyan Cosmetic Core pages. - Include contact information and bug reporting guidelines in English and Italian.

- Delete `src/assets/mods/ancient-golemancy/showcase/icon.png`.

Anchor .idea ignore pattern to root in .gitignore
- Update `.gitignore` to use `/.idea/` instead of `.idea/`.

Add Ancient Golemancy showcase assets
- Add two MP4 video files and an icon to `src/assets/mods/ancient-golemancy/showcase/`.

Refactor components and update Ancient Golemancy showcase
- Restructure Ko-fi widget into `Unlanguaged` and `Languaged` directories. - Implement `VideoPlayer` component with aspect ratio validation. - Add video showcase section and headers to Ancient Golemancy pages (EN/IT). - Update index pages to use the new Ko-fi component. - Add Ancient Golemancy showcase video assets.

Add Ancient Golemancy showcase icon
- Add `icon.png` to `src/assets/mods/ancient-golemancy/showcase/`.

Refactor Ko-fi widget and add videos to Ancient Golemancy
- Refactor Ko-fi widget structure into `Unlanguaged` base and `Languaged` wrappers. - Add `VideoPlayer` component with aspect ratio and size validation. - Add showcase videos and section headers to Ancient Golemancy pages (EN/IT). - Update English and Italian index pages to use the new Ko-fi button component.

- Add styled "Images" and "Immagini" headers to Lalyan Cosmetic Core pages (EN/IT).

Add changelogs and update Lalyan Cosmetic Core documentation
- Add changelog pages for Ancient Golemancy and Lalyan Cosmetic Core (EN/IT). - Add "Changelog" items to the sidebar in `astro.config.mjs`. - Update Lalyan Cosmetic Core documentation to reflect capitalized JSON keys (e.g., `Model`, `Texture`). - Add Permissions and Configuration sections to Lalyan Cosmetic Core documentation.

option.value:
Add changelogs and update Lalyan Cosmetic Core documentation
- Add changelog pages for Ancient Golemancy and Lalyan Cosmetic Core (EN/IT). - Add "Changelog" items to the sidebar in `astro.config.mjs`. - Update Lalyan Cosmetic Core documentation to reflect capitalized JSON keys (e.g., `Model`, `Texture`). - Add Permissions and Configuration sections to Lalyan Cosmetic Core documentation.
